title: Tomorrow workshop
content: The day is to submit the AI agent workshop assignment which is the deadline as well so note it.

title: Client Meeting Notes
content: Discussed new feature requirements and timeline adjustments. Client requested additional authentication options and improved mobile responsiveness. Follow-up needed on specifications.

title: Code Review Feedback
content: Review PR #342 - focus on error handling, add unit tests for edge cases, improve variable naming in authentication module. Overall architecture looks good but needs optimization.

title: Mobile App Concept
content: Build a habit tracking app with gamification elements. Users earn points and badges for consistency. Include social features to compete with friends and weekly challenges.

title: Blog Post Ideas
content: Topics: React performance optimization, microservices architecture patterns, building accessible web apps, CSS Grid vs Flexbox comparisons, TypeScript best practices for large projects.

title: Grocery Shopping List
content: Milk, eggs, bread, chicken, spinach, tomatoes, pasta, coffee beans, yogurt, apples, bananas, cheese, garlic.

title: Book Recommendations
content: Atomic Habits by James Clear, Deep Work by Cal Newport, The Pragmatic Programmer, Designing Data-Intensive Applications. Want to finish at least two books this month.

title: Q1 Project Planning
content: Outline objectives for Q1 including budget allocations, assignments, and key milestones. Need to schedule kick-off meeting with stakeholders and prepare presentation.

title: Vacation Planning
content: Research destinations for summer vacation. Options: Rome, Florence, Venice, Japan, Tokyo, Kyoto, or Iceland. Check flight prices and accommodation options. Budget around $3000-5000.
